issues.summary: Add Workflow and Signal information to the Authorizer's CallTarget struct to enable fine-grained authorization based on workflow type, task queue, and signal names in addition to namespace and API name.

issues.title: sql client is not compatible with mysql version 8+
issues.author: lshu-wish
issues.summary: SQL client used by Temporal is incompatible with MySQL 8+ when multiStatements flag is enabled. A user reported issues connecting to a Vitess cluster (MySQL 8.0) and found that disabling multiStatements support in the MySQL driver plugin resolves the problem.

issues.title: Workflow panics after cleanup activity, if cancel occurs during workflow sleep
issues.author: chooilow
issues.summary: Workflow panics with a state machine error when a cancel request occurs during a workflow sleep with a cleanup activity deferred. The error indicates a lookup failure for scheduledEventID to activityID mapping, causing the workflow to remain stuck in Running state instead of transitioning to Canceled.

issues.title: Reset for workflows to workflow task scheduled
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Feature request to allow resetting workflows to the workflow task scheduled event. Requires refactoring the history builder to support multiple history batches and modifying the workflow reset logic.

issues.title: High GetReplicationTasks QPS on clusters without any connected clients
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: GetReplicationTasks QPS is unexpectedly high (5000 QPS for 16k shards) on newly provisioned XDC clusters with no connected workers, suggesting unnecessary database calls in the replication mechanism.

issues.title: Report state transition number for workflows
issues.author: mikhailshilkov
issues.summary: Workflow execution complexity metrics: request to report the number of state transitions used by a workflow to the Temporal server, which helps evaluate the load burden on the server and is included in visibility records on close.

issues.title: [Bug] Clicking on run ID from event history does not link to execution
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Clicking on a runId link from the event history in the Temporal Web UI incorrectly navigates to the list executions view instead of the execution details page for that specific run.

issues.title: Flush activity start & last timeout / fail event when workflow finish
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Ensure activity start and last timeout/fail events are flushed when a workflow finishes, to prevent loss of critical activity state information.

issues.title: tctl: Make it easy to export JSON version of history
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Make it easier to export workflow history in JSON format from tctl by adding an explicit --output_format flag instead of relying on undiscovered --output_filename parameter. The current approach is not user-discoverable and lacks support for human-readable formatting of base64-encoded payload data.

issues.title: Workflow Reset: add logic of determining the reset point to the service
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The ResetWorkflowExecution gRPC API currently requires clients to specify a workflow_task_finish_event_id, forcing SDKs and tools to implement their own logic for determining the reset point. This issue requests moving the reset point determination logic to the service by adding a reset_type argument to support more flexible reset strategies.

issues.title: Remove namespace registration delay
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Namespace registration in Temporal is asynchronous, causing a 10-15 second delay before a newly registered namespace becomes available for use. Users currently must implement workarounds to detect when a namespace is ready, which is unreliable and impacts developer experience.

issues.title: Provide a way to define searchAttributes on a per-namespace basis
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Request to define searchAttributes on a per-namespace basis to avoid collisions between namespaces. Currently search attributes are scoped at the cluster level with no plans for namespace-level configuration.

issues.title: Allow to customize Zaplogger config through server options
issues.author: sp13ceg
issues.summary: Organization needs to customize Zap logger configuration for their specific JSON log format requirements and additional values. A request to make Zaplogger configurable through server options was implemented by allowing custom logger instances via WithLogger() server option.

issues.title: [Bug] 3 INVALID_ARGUMENT: only operation = is support for CloseTime
issues.author: app/
issues.summary: S3 archival integration fails with 'only operation = is support for CloseTime' error when querying visibility or history data through archival providers. The error occurs regardless of whether enableRead is enabled in the S3 configuration.

issues.title: Make workflow state (not status) available via API
issues.author: robholland
issues.summary: The workflow state (created, executing, completed, etc.) is not exposed via the Temporal API, making it impossible for the web UI or tctl to distinguish between workflows that are running versus those created but not yet started (e.g., cron workflows waiting for their scheduled time). This feature request asks to expose the internal state field through the APIs.

issues.title: Temporal sends queries to workflows which are created but not started
issues.author: robholland
issues.summary: Temporal incorrectly responds to queries for cron-scheduled workflows that have been created but not yet started, sending query requests to workers when the workflow hasn't begun execution. This causes issues in SDKs like Ruby that expect a workflow task in the history.

issues.title: Allow only connect to the CASSANDRA_SEED nodes and not others
issues.author: shiyao-afterpay
issues.summary: Temporal Server/Cassandra tools discover and connect to all Cassandra nodes returned by seed nodes, but some discovered nodes may be unreachable due to network policies in multi-datacenter setups. Users need the ability to restrict connections to only specified seed nodes or nodes in a specific datacenter to comply with regulatory requirements.

issues.title: temporal 1.5.1 build failed
issues.author: baxiaoshi
issues.summary: Build failure in temporal v1.5.1 due to internal package import restriction in kafka-client dependency. User attempted to build from source but encountered a Go compiler error related to vendor package access.

issues.title: Feature: provide arm64 builds to Docker Hub
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Docker builds for Temporal Server run slowly on Apple Silicon hardware due to x86 emulation, causing QEMU crashes. The feature request asks for native ARM64 builds to be published to Docker Hub for better compatibility.

issues.title: Implement backoff for workflow tasks
issues.author: rylandg
issues.summary: Request to implement backoff strategy for workflow tasks to improve resilience and operational efficiency when tasks fail or encounter transient issues.

issues.title: func VerifyCompatibleVersion blocks usage of different type of sql plugin
issues.author: Lercher
issues.summary: The VerifyCompatibleVersion function uses type-switch anti-pattern to check SQL plugin versions, creating hard dependencies on mysql and postgresql plugins even when using custom SQL plugins, and panics on unknown plugin types.

issues.title: Question: Can I persist retrievable data in a workflow that shared by activities?
issues.author: uynap
issues.summary: New user asks whether Temporal workflows support storing and sharing data between activities that can be retrieved from outside the workflow using SDK methods.

issues.title: Do not fail continue as new on a new signal
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Signal received during workflow task execution that completes with continue-as-new causes task failure, forcing replay and potentially creating infinite loops. The request is to pass signals to the next workflow run instead, making this behavior configurable.

issues.title: Remove unnecessary dependency on DB visibility config if ES is used
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Remove the dependency on database visibility configuration when Elasticsearch is being used. This is an enhancement to simplify configuration by eliminating an unnecessary DB visibility config requirement for users who have ES enabled.

issues.title: cassandra-tool couldn't connect to the Cassandra cluster
issues.author: app/
issues.summary: The cassandra-tool fails to connect to a Cassandra cluster with a timeout error, even though cqlsh can connect successfully using the same credentials and host information.

issues.title: CASSANDRA_DATACENTER is hidden in temporal-cassandra-tool create
issues.author: shiyao-afterpay
issues.summary: The CASSANDRA_DATACENTER environment variable is shadowed by a subcommand flag with the same name in temporal-cassandra-tool create, preventing its use with the autosetup feature.

issues.title: Add build steps for temporal-sql-tool
issues.author: unfor19
issues.summary: Request to provide build steps and pre-built binaries for temporal-sql-tool so users can build it without installing extra dependencies, potentially leveraging Docker for reproducible builds.

issues.title: Temporal Cassandra Tools doesn't expost ConnectTimeout
issues.author: shiyao-afterpay
issues.summary: Temporal Cassandra Tools CLI is missing a ConnectTimeout configuration option. While a generic Timeout flag exists, it doesn't expose gocql's ConnectTimeout field, which is needed when latency between client and Cassandra seed is high.

issues.title: Corrupted history event when workflow args are too large
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Workflow execution with oversized arguments creates a corrupted history event with no events, causing subsequent workflow retrievals to fail with 'corrupted history event batch' errors and blocking other workflow executions in the namespace.

issues.title: Cannot run temporal services as non-root user in kubernetes
issues.author: sivasamyk
issues.summary: Temporal services fail to start when running as non-root user in Kubernetes due to permission errors when writing configuration files. The issue blocks enterprises with security policies requiring non-root containers.

issues.title: Support cron workflows to (de/re)-schedule themselves
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Request for workflows to have the ability to reschedule or deschedule themselves dynamically. Currently, cron workflows that need to complete based on certain conditions require manual scheduling logic implementation.

issues.title: Support Timezones in the cron schedule
issues.author: Wattos
issues.summary: Request to support timezone-aware cron schedules in Temporal workflows. Currently, cron schedules only work with UTC times, but users need to run workflows at specific local times (e.g., 9AM Zurich time) with proper DST handling. The underlying robfig/cron library already supports CRON_TZ parameter, but this feature is undocumented and untested in Temporal.

issues.title: When running ./temporal-sql-tool I get Unknown system variable 'transaction_isolation'
issues.author: jalwandyags
issues.summary: User encounters 'Unknown system variable transaction_isolation' error when running temporal-sql-tool on MySQL 5.7 (Aurora RDS). The issue is resolved by setting the SQL_CONNECT_ATTRIBUTES environment variable to specify the transaction isolation level.

issues.title: Prevent incorrect service discovery with multiple Temporal clusters
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Multiple Temporal clusters in the same Kubernetes cluster can experience service discovery cross-contamination when pod IP addresses are reused. A frontend service from cluster A can incorrectly discover and connect to matching services from cluster B, leading to cross-cluster communication.

issues.title: Inactive Slack link
issues.author: kefimochi
issues.summary: The Slack community link in the README.md is broken and non-functional, preventing users from joining the Temporal Slack community.

issues.title: docker image temporalio/server:1.6.1   version report 1.6.0
issues.author: rmrf
issues.summary: Docker image temporalio/server:1.6.1 reports version 1.6.0 instead of 1.6.1 when running temporal-server -version command. The release did not include the necessary version number update in the binary.

issues.title: how to join different workflow
issues.author: GreedyGrand
issues.summary: User asks how to orchestrate and coordinate multiple workflows running in different microservices in sequence (Aâ†’Câ†’B). Clarification on workflow composition patterns across service boundaries.

issues.title: Perf optimization: skip delete visibility task generation
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Optimize performance by skipping visibility task generation when direct deletion of visibility records succeeds during workflow retention cleanup.

issues.title: [Basic function bug] CancelWorkflow does not work in 1.6.0
issues.author: ti
issues.summary: CancelWorkflow API does not properly cancel activities in version 1.6.0. The workflow transitions to PENDING_ACTIVITY_STATE_CANCEL_REQUESTED but the worker continues running, indicating the cancellation signal is not being propagated to the activity execution.

issues.title: Possible to set up new cluster with bad database version
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: User was able to set up a new cluster with an incorrect database schema version without validation, resulting in a mismatch between the actual schema and the recorded version. The tool should prevent this configuration error.

issues.title: Set application_name in Postgres connection string
issues.author: chris-rcn
issues.summary: Add application_name to PostgreSQL connection string to enable database logging and metrics to identify the Temporal application. This provides better observability for database operations.

issues.title: Binaries do not build for 386
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: Build fails for 32-bit Linux systems (GOARCH=386) due to untyped int64 constants exceeding 32-bit signed integer limits in the Elasticsearch visibility store.

issues.title: Add SignalWithReset
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add a SignalWithReset API that atomically resets a workflow to its last task and delivers a signal to it, enabling workflows to handle new signals and support complex reexecution patterns that are otherwise impossible with closed workflows.

issues.title: temporal-sql-tool dry-run not working
issues.author: moh-abk
issues.summary: The temporal-sql-tool's `-y` flag for dry-run is not working correctly - it still performs the schema migration instead of just simulating it.

issues.title: Please add ActivityCompletionClient support in TestActivityEnvironment
issues.author: rubyhfu
issues.summary: TestActivityEnvironment lacks support for injecting ActivityCompletionClient, which is needed for testing activities that use asynchronous completion. Users currently cannot test isolated activities that require this client.

issues.title: Expose ActivityStarted, ActivityCompleted, ActivityTimedOut events to running workflow
issues.author: meetchandan
issues.summary: Request to expose ActivityStarted, ActivityCompleted, and ActivityTimedOut events directly to running workflows so they can query activity state without iterating through the entire workflow history, which is slow and unscalable.

issues.title: Make consistency level on temporal-cassandra-tool and auto-setup image configurable
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: The temporal-cassandra-tool and auto-setup Docker image default to consistency level ALL, which is not supported by AWS Keyspaces. Users need CLI arguments and environment variables to configure alternative consistency levels for cloud-managed Cassandra services.

issues.title: Add support for rotation of TLS certificates
issues.author: sergeybykov
issues.summary: Temporal Server loads TLS certificates only at startup and never updates them, requiring server restarts to rotate certificates. The feature request asks for hot reload support, ideally with blue/green certificate pairs to enable rotation without restarts.

issues.title: Resume execution at last failure point of worflow
issues.author: reidlai
issues.summary: User requests a feature to resume failed workflows at the point of the last failed activity, rather than only at workflow task boundaries. The Temporal team indicated this capability is not currently supported and has no immediate plans for implementation.

issues.title: Provide a hook to specify a custom Cassandra seed node provider
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: Request for a custom Cassandra seed node provider hook to support dynamic discovery of seed node hostnames/IPs without requiring configuration updates when cluster membership changes.

issues.title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - rewrite Cassandra error handling
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Refactor and unify error handling in the Cassandra persistence layer to improve code maintainability and consistency. The issue targets two specific sections of the cassandraPersistence.go file that have duplicated or inconsistent error handling patterns.

issues.title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - unit test
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Add unit tests for NoSQL persistence layer queries covering all persistence abstractions (cluster metadata, history, matching, namespace, queue, and visibility). This is part of a broader NoSQL persistence refactoring effort to ensure comprehensive test coverage.

issues.title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - Interfaces & implementation
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Refactor NoSQL persistence layer by creating side interfaces similar to the existing SQL plugin architecture. This involves defining standardized interfaces for 22 different persistence concerns including cluster metadata, history activities, workflow execution, and task queue management.

issues.title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - business logic vs query interfaces
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Refactor NoSQL persistence layer to separate business logic from query interfaces, consolidating logic across cluster metadata, history events, namespace, queue, shard, matching tasks, visibility, execution, and related components into a single location.

issues.title: Activity environment deadline is not updated for activity retries
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Activity context deadline is not updated for retry attempts. The deadline should reflect the retry start time + StartToCloseTimeout, but instead remains set to the original activity execution time, causing context deadline exceeded errors on retry.

issues.title: Workflows and Activities should be able to access claims/permissions and other fields from validated JWT tokens
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Workflows and activities need access to validated JWT claims, permissions, and token fields from the Temporal authorizer and claim mappers. Currently, users must implement custom propagators and re-validate tokens, creating unnecessary complexity when calling other services or child workflows.

issues.title: authorizer and claimMapper should be configurable in yml (base or dynamic)
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Built-in authorizers and claimMappers cannot be configured via YAML config files; they are hardcoded to noop implementations. Users must build their own server from code or use server options to enable JWT-based authorization.

issues.title: server logs error Operation failed with internal error
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Temporal server logs a TransactionRetryWithProtoRefreshError when processing RespondActivityTaskCompleted operations in history service. The error occurs during workflow execution updates and appears to be a CockroachDB transaction retry issue that was resolved in later versions.

issues.title: Adjust throttle parameters
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: The default value for FrontendMaxNamespaceRPSPerInstance is set to 1200 but may not be optimal. Proper load testing is needed to determine appropriate throttle parameters for frontend RPS limiting.

issues.title: ParentExecution not set in WorkflowExecutionInfo
issues.author: ryanhall07
issues.summary: WorkflowExecutionInfo.ParentExecution is not populated for child workflows in List APIs, returning nil values. The field is only set in DescribeWorkflowExecution but not in ListOpenWorkflow/ListClosedWorkflow because parent execution info is not stored in the visibility database/Elasticsearch index.

issues.title: Add history_size_bytes to WorkflowExecutionInfo and PollWorkflowTaskQueueResponse
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add history_size_bytes field to WorkflowExecutionInfo and PollWorkflowTaskQueueResponse to expose aggregated workflow history size. This allows users and workflows to monitor history size for performance and make decisions like triggering continue-as-new operations.

issues.title: Workflow visibility query is slow on large MySQL visibility database
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Workflow visibility queries on large MySQL databases are extremely slow, taking 20-30 seconds to retrieve workflow lists from a namespace with 10 million visibility records. The query planner chooses the PRIMARY index resulting in a near table scan instead of using more efficient indexes.

issues.title: provide builtin support for jwtKeyProvider's that use EC public signing keys and do NOT supply x5c attribute
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: Add built-in TokenKeyProvider implementation that supports both EC and RSA public signing keys, and handles JSON key responses without the optional x5c attribute.

issues.title: relation "schema_version" does not exist on fresh postgresql DB
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: PostgreSQL database schema initialization fails on fresh Temporal database with 'relation schema_version does not exist' error when using AUTO_SETUP=true. The issue occurs because the regular temporal:1.4.1 image does not properly initialize the PostgreSQL schema, requiring the auto-setup image instead.

issues.title: temporal-sql-tool not idempotent
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: The temporal-sql-tool is not idempotent - if it fails halfway through execution, re-running the same command fails because some tables were already created. This affects schema migrations from v0 to v1.0 and subsequent version upgrades, forcing users to manually drop and recreate the schema.

issues.title: Server startup schema version check should not use ALL as CL
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: The Cassandra data backend should use a lower consistency level (LOCAL_QUORUM or QUORUM) instead of ALL when performing schema version checks during server startup, to improve reliability and performance.

issues.title: Use workflow raw history events API
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Eliminate unnecessary deserialization and serialization cycles of workflow history events between frontend and SDKs. Currently, events are deserialized, then serialized, then deserialized again when passed to SDKs, which is inefficient and redundant.

issues.title: Allow directly inject tasks without updating mutable state
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Allow direct task injection into the database without requiring mutable state updates. This capability is needed for workflow record deletion in Elasticsearch, enabling the DB layer to handle tasks independently of mutable state management.

issues.title: Please provide tools binaries in the release.
issues.author: lerminou
issues.summary: Request to include cassandra-schema-tool binary in release artifacts. User questions whether the tool needs to be rebuilt when updating versions or only when .proto files are modified.

issues.title: Workflow history size / count exceeds limit
issues.author: doshide
issues.summary: User's long-running workflow is being terminated after one day because the workflow history size/count exceeds the server's limit. The issue discusses the limitations of running workflows for years with continuous event accumulation.

issues.title: Dropped tasks when cancelling polling requests under load
issues.author: antstorm
issues.summary: Tasks are being dropped when polling requests are cancelled under load, particularly when workers are restarted during high activity scheduling. This causes activities and workflows to timeout instead of being dispatched to an available poller.

issues.title: On first start Temporal should not accept connections until Default namespace is setup
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Temporal server accepts client connections before the default namespace is created during initial startup, causing workers to fail with 'Namespace default does not exist' error. The server should not accept connections until it's in a fully operable state with the default namespace initialized.

issues.title: TLS support for PostgreSQL
issues.author: fxsever
issues.summary: TLS support for PostgreSQL was not properly configured, using 'verify-ca' mode instead of 'require' mode when host verification is disabled. The fix adds the missing SSL mode constant and corrects the SSL parameter setting logic.

issues.title: Convert NDC RPC stack to use gRPC stream functionality
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Convert NDC RPC stack from periodic polling to gRPC stream functionality to reduce complexity in handling replication task throttling, lag management, and backpressure control.

issues.title: Unify common.Daemon interface and common logic
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Unify the common.Daemon interface and abstract the repeated start/stop logic with atomic compare-and-swap pattern that is scattered throughout the server codebase into a reusable common library.

issues.title: Ensure major.minor.patch to major.minor+1.patch upgrade
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Temporal server should support upgrade paths from major.minor.patch to major.minor+1.patch versions. This is a feature request to ensure compatibility and provide a clear upgrade strategy for users moving between minor version releases.

issues.title: Batch workflow signals
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to add support for sending batch workflow signals instead of only one signal at a time. Currently, signal workflow and signal with start workflow APIs only accept a single signal, but users need the ability to send multiple signals together.

issues.title: Emit workflow execution lock wait time
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to emit workflow execution lock wait time as metrics. The enhancement was implemented by adding metric emissions in the history cache component.

issues.title: Migration - History to Matching API expiration duration
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Migrate AddWorkflowTask and AddActivityTask APIs to use task expiration time instead of TTL duration. This is a two-version migration where the first version sets both expiration time and TTL (matching service prefers expiration), and the second version deprecates TTL entirely.

issues.title: Add a CLI and tab in the web dashboard to display all taskQueues list / pollers
issues.author: lerminou
issues.summary: Request to add a CLI command and web dashboard tab to display all task queues and their associated pollers. Currently, pollers can only be viewed by navigating through a workflow detail page, making it difficult to debug dynamically registered task queues.

issues.title: Maintenance workflow cleanup stale queue tasks
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Temporal worker needs a background maintenance workflow to clean up stale queue tasks (workflow and activity tasks) even in Cassandra, where tasks are considered stale if their workflow is finished and no poller is actively polling the task queue.

issues.title: Add CANCEL_REQUESTED status
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: DescribeWorkflowExecution API result does not indicate when a workflow cancel has been requested. The feature request asks for adding a CANCEL_REQUESTED status or additional property to the DescribeWorkflowExecutionResult to distinguish between canceled and canceling states.

issues.title: Support pausing/resuming Temporal services' work
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: Request to support pausing and resuming Temporal services during blue/green deployments. Users need to put services into a disabled state during rollouts where infrastructure remains hot but doesn't process work, enabling faster rollback without full service restart.

issues.title: Add extensibility mechanism to pass in custom metrics reporter
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Request to add an extensibility mechanism allowing users to pass in custom metrics reporters instead of being limited to built-in statsd, prometheus, and m3db backends. This would enable organizations to use proprietary or less common metrics backends without needing to contribute to the Temporal open source repository.

issues.title: tctl admin database commands fail on Aurora MySQL
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: tctl admin database commands fail on Aurora MySQL due to an unknown 'transaction_isolation' system variable. The service config supports connection attributes to work around this, but tctl lacks a mechanism to pass these attributes.

issues.title: Allow fine grained workflow retention
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Feature request to allow workflow retention to be specified in finer-grained units (hours) instead of just days. Discussion includes concerns about implications for global namespaces with replication.

issues.title: [request] API needs for Temporal Web
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Request for multiple API enhancements to support Temporal Web, including combined OPEN+CLOSED workflow queries, backwards pagination, server-side event filtering in History, and parent workflow to child workflow discovery.

issues.title: Flow LastCompletionResult from previous run if the cron workflow times out
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: GetLastCompletionResult returns null when a cron workflow times out or fails in the previous run, instead of flowing the result from the actual last completion. The completion result should be preserved across cron reruns regardless of timeout/failure status.

issues.title: Force complete activity when it is retrying
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Request to allow force-completing activities that are retrying or backing off without restarting the workflow. The RespondActivityTaskCompletedById API needs to support retry attempts and allow completion when activities are in backoff state.

issues.title: How to configure to reduce scheduling time.
issues.author: a18401626205
issues.summary: User reports significant performance degradation when increasing concurrent load in Temporal workflows, with scheduling time increasing from 1s (10 concurrent) to 10s (100 concurrent). Seeks configuration options to improve performance.

issues.title: loggging/exception stack trace not capturing underlying errors
issues.author: kkcmadhu
issues.summary: Error messages from S3 archival failures are not properly propagated when creating namespaces, showing only generic "Forbidden" errors without indicating the underlying S3 access key misconfiguration.

issues.title: Panic while running with postgres (CRDB 20.1.x)
issues.author: robzienert
issues.summary: History service panics during startup with PostgreSQL/CRDB 20.1.x when creating workflow executions due to a reflection error in the sqlx library used for SQL binding. The issue was resolved by updating the sqlx dependency with a temporal workaround.

issues.title: Remove unnecessary conversion in mutable state
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Remove unnecessary type conversions in the mutable state builder. The code at lines 3900-3913 in mutableStateBuilder.go contains conversions that serve no purpose and should be eliminated.

issues.title: Convert rate limiter allowing burst
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Feature request to enhance the convert rate limiter to allow burst capability, enabling temporary rate exceeding during conversion operations.

issues.title: Support of batch activity
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to add support for batch activity execution to reduce unnecessary command tasks and improve performance when executing multiple activities.

issues.title: Have a Deleted state for entities state machine in mutable state
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Design discussion about marking Cassandra records as deleted instead of actually deleting them to address potential tombstone performance issues in the mutable state machine.

issues.title: Optimize SQL query supporting batch delete
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Optimize SQL query supporting batch delete operations to improve performance and efficiency when deleting multiple records.

issues.title: Support for setting max payload size
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: User encountered ResourceExhausted error when sending large payloads (~13MB) through Temporal, exceeding the default max message size of 4MB. Request for ability to configure max payload size limit.

issues.title: Support for in memory db and setup for running temporal with limited resources
issues.author: morenohernan
issues.summary: Request to support in-memory database option and optimize Temporal for edge/IoT deployments with limited resources (2 cores, 2GB RAM). Users need documentation and a simpler setup for running Temporal with good throughput in resource-constrained environments.

issues.title: Code cleanup
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Remove unused WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes and Cause field from WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes to clean up the codebase.

issues.title: docs: Add multi-region deployment documentation
issues.author: robinbraemer
issues.summary: Request for documentation on multi-region deployment architecture for Temporal, including strategies for scaling globally with region-aware storage backends like CockroachDB while managing consistency trade-offs.

issues.title: CLI "namespace update" incorrectly reports success when specifying non-day retention period
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: The CLI 'namespace update' command incorrectly reports success when users specify a retention period in a non-day format (e.g., '0h10m0s'). The command fails to parse non-integer retention values but does not indicate the failure, leaving users unaware that the update did not occur.

issues.title: CLI "namespace register" and "namespace update" should allow more granular retention periods
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: CLI namespace register and update commands need to support sub-day retention period granularity (at least to the minute level) instead of only accepting day-level values.

issues.title: Unify all persistence TTL handling logic
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Unify TTL (Time-To-Live) handling logic across SQL and NoSQL persistence backends. Currently these implementations handle record TTL differently, and the goal is to standardize the approach so both follow the same pattern already established in the SQL worker setup.

issues.title: Persistence Layer Unified Serialization / Deserialization
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Consolidate all persistence layer serialization and deserialization logic into a unified location instead of having it scattered across SQL and NoSQL implementations.

issues.title: Emit workflow completion metric on ContinueAsNew due to Cron or Retry
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Workflows with cron or retry policies emit ContinueAsNew instead of workflow_failed metrics, causing confusing and missing failure reporting that doesn't accurately reflect actual workflow failures.

issues.title: Prebuild binaries
issues.author: MaksimRT
issues.summary: Request to provide prebuilt binary releases for Temporal server, admin tools, and web UI to simplify deployment and installation for users.

issues.title: Add configurable initialDelay for Cron job setup for the first run
issues.author: doqtri
issues.summary: Feature request to add configurable initialDelay for CRON job setup to control when the first run executes. Currently, the initial delay is automatically calculated and unpredictable; users need explicit configuration options.

issues.title: Is there an example for using temporal to implement a human involved task?
issues.author: tonyabracadabra
issues.summary: User asks for guidance on implementing human approval workflows in Temporal, specifically how to handle approval requests and conditional progression based on approval status. Community points to the expense example and discusses using signals instead of external pub/sub for handling human-driven workflows.

issues.title: Postgres password should be escaped (special characters)
issues.author: nadilas
issues.summary: PostgreSQL database connections fail when the password contains special characters because the password isn't URL-encoded. The fix requires escaping the password using url.QueryEscape before constructing the connection URL.

issues.title: tctl admin commands not working for history hosts
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: The tctl admin hist desc command fails with 'Request is nil' error when attempting to describe history hosts. This prevents administrators from querying history host information via the CLI.

issues.title: sql schema version compatibility check failed
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Schema version compatibility check fails on startup when using PostgreSQL auto-setup due to mismatched schema directory structure and version mismatch between admin-tools and server versions.

issues.title: DynamicConfig TaskQueuePartitions TaskType Constraint compares ENUM to a string/int, so it never matches
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: DynamicConfig TaskQueuePartitions has a TaskType constraint that compares an ENUM to a string/int, causing it to never match. The TaskType constraint should also be optional to allow applying the same partition count to both Activity and Workflow tasks.

issues.title: History service should pause accepting new signals if worker cannot keep up.
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: The history service should implement a pause mechanism to handle backpressure when worker processing cannot keep up with incoming signal events. This prevents worker overload by temporarily stopping signal acceptance.

issues.title: Temporal Web UI still show completed workflow as running
issues.author: sunjiawen
issues.summary: Web UI displays completed workflows in the open workflows list instead of only showing running workflows. The root cause is that the visibility API provides eventually consistent semantics, so closed workflows may appear in open workflow responses when the visibility queue has a backlog.

issues.title: Matching Service Task Queue Metadata Management
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Partitioned matching task queues may experience delays in task delivery if a matching service instance shuts down before workers poll. The system needs a centralized metadata manager to ensure all matching services initialize required task queue managers, and consider round-robin polling for better distribution.

issues.title: docker image expects database name to be postgresql
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: The Temporal Docker image's start.sh script hardcodes the database hostname to 'postgresql', preventing users from using custom database service names like 'temporal-db'. This causes initialization failures when the actual service name differs from the expected one.

issues.title: tctl admin db scan fails with panic / segmentation violation
issues.author: serhii-samoilenko
issues.summary: The tctl admin db scan command fails with a segmentation violation (nil pointer dereference) when scanning Cassandra databases. The scan completes the first shard but crashes during execution listing due to an uninitialized pointer in the cassandraPersistence.ListConcreteExecutions method.

issues.title: Failure to connect to ElasticSearch on startup should not fail startup
issues.author: kelnos
issues.summary: Temporal server fails to start when ElasticSearch cluster is unavailable, even though ES is non-essential for data durability since writes are queued to Kafka. This blocks critical operations like node replacement during infrastructure outages.

issues.title: Failed DB migration (PostgreSQL): auto-setup:1.0.0 -> auto-setup:1.1.0
issues.author: kop
issues.summary: Database migration from auto-setup:1.0.0 to 1.1.0 fails because the PostgreSQL visibility schema files were moved to a versioned subdirectory (schema/postgresql/v96), but the migration script still looks for them in the old location.

issues.title: Validate pings from different cluster does not result in joining the membership ring
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Add cluster name configuration to Ringpop initialization to prevent nodes from different clusters from accidentally joining the same membership ring through invalid pings.

issues.title: Support in mem TLS configuration / data for PostgreSQL
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to support in-memory TLS configuration (key, cert, CA) for PostgreSQL connections in Temporal Server, following similar functionality available in the pq PostgreSQL driver.

issues.title: Remove replication_metadata and replication_metadata_encoding from Cassandra schema
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Remove unused replication_metadata and replication_metadata_encoding fields from the Cassandra schema to improve performance and reduce storage overhead.

issues.title: Support blue/green cluster deployment with incompatible cluster membership changes
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Support blue/green cluster deployment strategy that allows backward-incompatible cluster membership protocol changes without downtime. Currently, newly deployed instances cannot communicate with old versions, causing cluster partitioning and constant shard stealing. The request is for a mechanism to exclude newly added hosts from shard hosting during deployment, then switch to using only the new hosts after deployment completes.

issues.title: Generate a signed token for each workflow activity
issues.author: randomswdev
issues.summary: Request to generate signed tokens for workflow activities that certify worker identity and execution context (activity/workflow name, task list, etc.), enabling workers to authenticate with external systems using their temporal role.

issues.title: Support for pluggable authorizers
issues.author: randomswdev
issues.summary: Request for pluggable authorization system that allows loading authorization implementations without recompiling Temporal Server. Users want to either load plugins via Go plugin interface or call external services like OPA (Open Policy Agent).

issues.title: grpc 1.33 was removed
issues.author: linvon
issues.summary: gRPC v1.33 was removed from the upstream repository, but both Temporal and its API module are still pinned to this deprecated version. This breaks `go mod vendor` operations for users trying to vendor dependencies.

issues.title: Workflow reset try to create new history tree 2+ times
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Workflow reset redundantly creates new history trees multiple times instead of once. The reset process should create a single new history tree for the workflow.

issues.title: PostgreSQL persistence tests should correctly drop test database
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: PostgreSQL persistence tests fail to properly drop test databases, resulting in 'database is being accessed by other users' errors. This prevents test cleanup and causes test suite failures.

issues.title: allow disabling hostname/cert verification when connecting with TLS/mTLS
issues.author: underrun
issues.summary: Feature request to add command-line option for disabling hostname and certificate verification in TLS/mTLS connections for dev/test/debug purposes. This allows testing TLS encryption independently from certificate validation.

issues.title: Revisit persistence interface (SQL / NoSQL) before modularization
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Before modularizing and allowing public overrides of the persistence layer, the interfaces and naming conventions need to be revisited to ensure they are well-designed for this purpose.

issues.title: Synchronous Start
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to enable input validation before workflow start. Currently impossible to reject StartWorkflow calls with invalid input data; proposal is to implement worker queries for validation before workflow execution begins.

issues.title: Enable Serialization on WorkflowQueue
issues.author: chalac
issues.summary: WorkflowQueue needs to implement Serializable to enable event processing patterns that avoid long-running workflows. This is a Java SDK feature request to make WorkflowQueue serializable for ordered entity event processing.

issues.title: Revisit matching engine ListTaskQueue functionality
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Code review needed for the ListTaskQueue functionality in the matching engine's SQL task manager implementation. The issue flags a specific code section that may need refactoring or optimization.

issues.title: Frequent timeouts while archiving to S3
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: S3 archival operations frequently timeout due to inconsistent context deadlines. While archiving to S3-compliant object stores, the timeout deadline varies from under 1 second to just under 60 seconds, causing many S3 calls to fail even with low-latency storage.

issues.title: Workflow-less activity
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Request to enable direct invocation of activities outside of workflows for better interactive development experience, particularly for specialized hardware setups and dynamic testing against staging/production clusters.

issues.title: Revisite #776 since the replication task fetcher logic looks weird
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Error handling in replication task fetcher logic is implicit and should be made explicit. The issue references #776 and requests that non-nil error cases be handled explicitly rather than implicitly.

issues.title: No way to install in tctl binaries in windows?
issues.author: anborg
issues.summary: User asks how to install and build tctl (CLI tool) on Windows, as the documentation only mentions make command which is Unix-specific. Community provides go build workarounds, but long-term Windows binary distribution would be beneficial.

issues.title: Add ScheduleToStart timeout to WorkflowTaskScheduledEvent
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: The WorkflowTaskScheduledEvent does not expose the ScheduleToStart timeout value, making it unclear to users why tasks timeout at 5 seconds for sticky workers despite the UI showing 10 seconds. Adding this field to the event would improve clarity.

issues.title: session and childworkflow
issues.author: linvon
issues.summary: User asks whether sessions apply to activities in child workflows and whether session data is preserved when passing context to child workflows. The issue questions if activities in child workflows execute on the same worker as the session.

issues.title: Workflow loses cron when also using NewContinueAsNewError
issues.author: AAAstorga
issues.summary: When a workflow uses NewContinueAsNewError with a CronSchedule, the cron configuration is lost after the first continue-as-new, preventing future cron executions.

issues.title: Create integration test for GetWorkflowExecutionRawHistoryV2 API
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Integration tests for the GetWorkflowExecutionRawHistoryV2 API need to be created. Previous tests for this API were removed in PR #744 and require reimplementation.

issues.title: Support reset starting from an activity of a specific type.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to support resetting a workflow from a specific activity type and status, enabling programmatic retrieval of event IDs for bulk workflow reruns when downstream services fail.

issues.title: Handle TLS configuration through (docker) Env vars
issues.author: P4ndaFR
issues.summary: Request to enable TLS configuration through Docker environment variables in the config template, allowing easier deployment in containerized environments like Kubernetes without requiring ConfigMap merges.

issues.title: Resetting open child workflow should not sent Terminated Failure to the parent
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: When a child workflow is reset while open, the parent workflow incorrectly receives a ChildWorkflowExecutionTerminated event instead of treating the reset as transparent. The parent should see the reset child as the same child with only a new completion event.

issues.title: Blank namespace in the history event for childworkflow
issues.author: darewreck54
issues.summary: Child workflow namespace attribute is blank in history events when queried via GetWorkflowExecutionHistoryRequest, even though the namespace was specified in the initial query.

issues.title: ActiveCluster can not switch automatically
issues.author: linvon
issues.summary: User reports that automatic cluster failover is not working as expected in their NDC deployment. After killing the active cluster, no automatic switch to standby cluster occurred, and they request clarification on HA cluster switching behavior.

issues.title: Local Activity Marker Corruption
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Local activity workflows experience history corruption during replay, resulting in corrupted workflow state. The issue affects the marker tracking for local activities, causing inconsistent state between cache and database mutable states.

issues.title: Add unit testing for decoding REPLICATION_TASK_TYPE_HISTORY_V2_TASK
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Unit tests for REPLICATION_TASK_TYPE_HISTORY_V2_TASK message decoding were removed during refactoring to remove 2dc-specific code paths. Need to add new unit tests to cover the history replication task decoding functionality.

issues.title: Corrupted history event batch after Cassandra restart
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: After sequentially restarting Cassandra nodes with replication factor 1 while workflows are starting, corrupted history event batches occur with non-continuous event IDs, making workflows inaccessible.

issues.title: Support reset with pending child workflows
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Reset workflow execution is currently blocked if there are any pending child workflow executions. This feature request asks for support to allow reset operations even when child workflows are still running.

issues.title: Auto backfill VersionHistory for local namespace workflows
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Local namespaces do not have VersionHistory set for workflow executions, preventing migration to global namespaces. This feature request asks for auto-populating VersionHistory for workflows created in local namespaces.

issues.title: MutableState cleanup to remove unused fields
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Remove unused fields (start version, last write version, current version) from MutableState record and related functions in persistence layer utilities.

issues.title: Remove admin kafka resend command
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Remove the admin kafka resend command which is no longer needed after the removal of 2dc in PR #692.

issues.title: Implement HandleErr logic for history metadata replication task
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: HandleErr logic needs to be implemented for HistoryMetadataReplicationTask in the NDC (non-2dc) code path. This functionality was only available in the 2dc path before PR #692 removed all 2dc-specific logic.

issues.title: History Engine refactoring
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: History engine codebase needs refactoring into smaller packages to improve test organization and maintainability. Current test suites (TestEngine2Suite, TestEngine3Suite, TestEngineSuite) are messy, particularly after 2DC removal.

issues.title: Enable TestActivityReplicatorSuite unit test removed during 2dc deprecation
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Unit tests for activity replication were removed during 2DC deprecation in PR #692. Need to create equivalent NDC tests to restore coverage for activity sync scenarios including activity completion, running states, and version/attempt comparisons.

issues.title: Custom Tags addition in existing Metric using java sdk is not working
issues.author: techFool
issues.summary: Custom tags cannot be added to existing metrics in the Java SDK. Users attempting to add custom tags to Temporal metrics are finding that the tags do not appear in the metric output.

issues.title: Scheduling a Workflow Timer that exceeds the Workflow Execution Timeout should (potentially) fail
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Currently, Temporal doesn't validate or prevent scheduling workflow timers that would fire after the workflow execution timeout expires. The issue requests validation to either fail timer creation or auto-cap the timer duration to respect workflow execution limits.

issues.title: Add dynamic config knob to limit maximum duration for Timers
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Request for a dynamic configuration option to enforce maximum duration limits on Workflow Timers. Administrators want the ability to prevent timers exceeding a specified duration from being scheduled, forcing users to adopt ContinueAsNew patterns and preventing workflows from becoming too old.

issues.title: Delay workflow completion until abandoned children start
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Parent workflows currently exit immediately even if child workflows with abandon parent policy haven't started yet, preventing those children from ever starting. The proposal is to automatically delay workflow completion until abandoned children have reported successful startup.

issues.title: DynamoDB persistence driver
issues.author: jvassev
issues.summary: Request to add DynamoDB as a persistence driver option for Temporal. The issue explores feasibility, noting DynamoDB's transaction size limitations and schema differences from SQL-based persistence drivers, with discussion about whether single-shard or alternative designs could work.

issues.title: First Level back pressure support
issues.author: sneerin
issues.summary: User inquires about backpressure support in Temporal to prevent overwhelming the database with excessive requests. The issue discusses existing service protection mechanisms and configuration options available for rate limiting.

issues.title: Signal to self error in Workflow code
issues.author: pauldemarco
issues.summary: Workflows cannot signal themselves, throwing UnknownExternalWorkflowExecution error. Users request this capability as an enhancement for metrics tracking and signal-driven architecture patterns, though the server currently prevents it due to implementation constraints (deadlock risk from locking).

issues.title: Add ability for workflow to wait for completion of an external workflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow code currently cannot wait for the completion of external workflows (workflows not started as child workflows). This feature would enable deciders to await completion of any workflow by ID, similar to how child workflows can be monitored.

issues.title: TCTL command truncates workflow activity input/output with ellipses
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: TCTL commands truncate workflow activity input/output with ellipses, making it difficult to view complete data. Users need either truncation disabled or a flag to control the truncation behavior for full output display.

issues.title: Support for loading history events using size of batches rather than count
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: History events are currently loaded by batch count, but when users write large payloads a single batch can be oversized. This causes unnecessary events to be loaded and discarded when the actual page size limit is reached. The feature request is to support loading events based on size in bytes rather than batch count.

issues.title: Rate limiting pagination based on history sizes
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Current rate limiting is based on API call RPS only and doesn't account for large payload sizes, causing the database to load and ship huge amounts of data over the wire. The request is to implement payload-size-aware rate limiting that throttles namespaces exceeding configured quotas.

issues.title: Heartbeat WorkflowTask during history pagination
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: For workflows with long history, paginating through history events during replay can exceed the workflow task timeout, causing task retries and system thrashing. The request is to implement workflow task heartbeats during history pagination to keep the timeout renewed.

issues.title: Setting PROMETHEUS_ENDPOINT in docker-compose results in prometheus reporter errors
issues.author: MisterCodo
issues.summary: Setting PROMETHEUS_ENDPOINT in docker-compose causes bind address conflicts and metric registration errors because multiple service roles (frontend, history, matching, worker) attempt to listen on the same port simultaneously.

issues.title: Cockroach 0.28.0 fails with: column "version_partition" does not exist
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Temporal Server 0.28.0 fails to start with CockroachDB (PostgreSQL-compatible) due to a missing 'version_partition' column in the schema_version table. The schema migration tool reports the column does not exist when trying to read the current schema version.

issues.title: Make server stacktraces more readable during debugging
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: Server logs are emitted in JSON format, which is suitable for production but makes local development and debugging painful because stack traces are encoded as single-line strings with escaped newlines and tabs. A pretty-printing or console log format mode is needed for improved readability during debugging.

issues.title: Ambiguous "context deadline exceeded" error cause on the CLI during server failures
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: CLI displays ambiguous 'context deadline exceeded' error during server failures instead of showing actual error details, and times out instead of returning immediately when errors occur.

issues.title: Configuration of Cassandra ConnectTimeout
issues.author: Ryan-Thomas
issues.summary: User requests addition of ConnectTimeout configuration option for Cassandra database connections in Temporal Server. This would allow operators to customize the connection timeout duration via YAML configuration.

issues.title: respondWorkflowTaskCompleted doesn't fail on bad commands
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: respondWorkflowTaskCompleted returns OK instead of failing with INVALID_ARGUMENT when commands are malformed, such as RECORD_MARKER commands missing required attributes.

issues.title: Add CLI version to generated JSON files
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Feature request to include CLI and server version information in generated JSON files such as history dumps for better traceability and debugging.

issues.title: List workflow executions APIs should not require namespace and filter fields
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: List workflow execution APIs require namespace and filter parameters that should have sensible defaults. The namespace should default to 'default' and time filters should not have confusing validation errors when only some fields are set.

issues.title: Add control of archival feature initial state through docker-compose parameter
issues.author: feedmeapples
issues.summary: Admin users cannot control the initial state of the archival feature through docker-compose parameters. The request is to add this configuration option with archival disabled by default.

issues.title: Unable to connect to AWS hosted elasticsearch
issues.author: kfoxb
issues.summary: AWS Elasticsearch instances on ports 80/443 fail to connect due to sniffing being enabled in the Elasticsearch client. The error 'context deadline exceeded' occurs because sniffing is not supported on HTTP-only ports. Disabling sniffing via a config flag would allow connections to AWS Elasticsearch instances.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestActivityRetry is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: TestActivityHeartbeatTimeouts test has a data race condition between goroutines reading and writing to the same memory location, causing the test to be flaky. The issue involves concurrent access to shared state in activity heartbeat timeout handling.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestActivityHeartbeatTimeouts is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: TestActivityHeartbeatTimeouts test is flaky, intermittently failing because activities are unexpectedly completing instead of timing out. Investigation revealed possible bug in timer task handling for heartbeat timeouts.

issues.title: Rename cadence-cluster-topics to temporal-cluster-topics
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: CrossDC configuration in Temporal still uses the legacy `cadence-cluster-topics` key for Kafka topic mapping. This needs to be renamed to `temporal-cluster-topics` to align with the Temporal branding.

issues.title: Add proper unit / integration tests for parentclosepolicy workflow
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Lack of unit/integration tests for parentclosepolicy workflow allowed a nil context bug to slip through to stress testing. The issue highlights missing test coverage that should have caught the basic error earlier in development.

issues.title: Cascading terminate of parent workflow does not percolate to descendants
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Parent workflow termination does not propagate to child workflows. When a parent workflow is terminated, child workflows with TERMINATE parent close policy remain in Running state instead of being terminated, and the parent close policy processor crashes with a nil pointer dereference when attempting to terminate children.

issues.title: Support MySQL persistence for Admin commands which directly connects to database
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Add support for MySQL database persistence in tctl admin commands that require direct database access. Currently, only Cassandra is supported for these operational commands.

issues.title: Disable archival by default for temporal docker
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Docker Compose setup enables archival by default, but for development purposes archival should be disabled. The issue requests moving archival configuration to a separate docker-compose-archival.yaml file.

issues.title: Allow configuration of archival config through docker
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Docker image lacks a mechanism to configure archival settings. Users need the ability to override archival configuration when deploying Temporal via Docker.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestActivityHeartbeatDetailsDuringRetry is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: TestActivityHeartbeatDetailsDuringRetry test was flaky but resolved itself through consistent passing over time.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestCronChildWorkflowExecution is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: TestCronChildWorkflowExecution test is flaky with nil pointer assertions. The error indicates a race condition or timing issue in the test suite where an expected value is unexpectedly nil.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestCronWorkflow is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: The TestCronWorkflow integration test is flaky, with a backoff calculation assertion failing intermittently. The test expects backoff 2-0 to be a multiplier of target backoff 3, but occasionally gets different values.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestWorkflowTimeout is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: TestWorkflowTimeout test in the integration test suite is flaky, sometimes expecting 1 result but getting 2. The issue was reported as passing consistently after investigation.

issues.title: listTaskQueuePartitions in MatchingService matching engine needs unit tests
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: The listTaskQueuePartitions API in MatchingService has a bug that should have been caught by basic unit tests. A fix is ready but the codebase needs better test coverage for this functionality.

issues.title: SQL Visibility Paging APIs need more targeted unit tests
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: SQL Visibility API paging logic had multiple bugs that were only discovered during manual testing of a separate issue. Test coverage for this critical component needs to be significantly improved to prevent future regressions.

issues.title: A  "tq lp --taskqueue foo" command causes server process to panic
issues.author: shyamalprasad
issues.summary: A `tq lp --taskqueue foo` command causes the Temporal server to panic with a nil pointer dereference when marshaling TaskQueuePartitionMetadata. The panic occurs in the gRPC marshaling layer when the server attempts to serialize a nil pointer.

issues.title: Unable to reset Workflow with hole in history events
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Workflow reset fails when history has gaps/holes in events, making the workflow unrecoverable even to points before the corruption. The reset command cannot proceed because it reads the entire history before attempting recovery.

issues.title: [Go SDK Bench] Corrupted incontinouous event batch makes workflow unusuable
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: A workflow became permanently stuck due to a corrupted history event batch with non-continuous event IDs (event 1851 missing between 1850 and 1852). The workflow repeatedly encounters an error and cannot progress.

issues.title: All Elasticsearch errors are returned back as internal service errors
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Elasticsearch errors like 400 Bad Request are incorrectly wrapped as Internal service errors, triggering unwanted client retry logic. The solution requires replacing Internal with Unavailable error codes to differentiate retriable from non-retriable failures, which is a breaking change requiring SDK/server version coordination.

issues.title: Calls to Elasticsearch does not specify any timeout
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Elasticsearch visibility API calls lack timeout configuration, using context.Background() instead of a timeout context. This can cause requests to hang indefinitely if the Elasticsearch service becomes unresponsive.

issues.title: Remove unused ports from Dockerfile
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Remove unused ports (7933, 7934, 7935, 7939) that are exposed in the Dockerfile and are leftover from Cadence's tchannel RPC stack, which has been completely removed from the codebase.

issues.title: Change default order for listClosedWorkflowExecutions to by close time [SQL Visibility Store]
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: The SQL visibility store orders closed workflow queries by start_time instead of close_time, which is confusing and prevents filtering workflows by close time. This needs to be changed to match expected behavior for closed workflows.

issues.title: Background scan to remove unnecessary timers
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Proposal for a background job to scan timer queues and remove timers for completed workflows and tasks, reducing unnecessary timer overhead. Many timeout-protected tasks end up with redundant timers when they complete successfully.

issues.title: Introduce a concept of infinite timeout
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Temporal currently creates a timeout task for every workflow execution with a server default of 10 years, which creates unnecessary timers in the database for short-lived workflows. The proposal is to introduce an infinite timeout concept and switch the server default to infinite, avoiding creation of timeout tasks when not needed.

issues.title: Request for standardized suffixes (Temporal doesn't abbreviate very well into a 3-4 letter key)
issues.author: nodiex-cloud
issues.summary: Request for a standardized abbreviation/suffix for 'Temporal' in code. The author seeks a 3-4 character abbreviation similar to how 'Cadence' was abbreviated as 'cdnc', with discussion leading to 'tmpl' as the proposed standard.

issues.title: ChildWorkflow inherits WorkflowRunTimeout from parent
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: ChildWorkflow inherits WorkflowRunTimeout from parent workflow execution instead of using the default or specified value. This causes child workflows to have unexpectedly short run timeouts when the parent has a shorter execution timeout.

issues.title: Allow for https connections to elasticsearch
issues.author: markmark206
issues.summary: Elasticsearch HTTPS connections are not supported - the temporal Helm chart exposes an HTTPS scheme option, but the start script hardcodes HTTP, preventing secure connections to Elasticsearch.

issues.title: Ability to clear/unset search attributes
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Users request the ability to clear or unset search attributes in workflows, rather than only being able to set or update them. Currently, workarounds involve setting sentinel values or empty collections.

issues.title: cli: Workflow start command throws Invalid Format
issues.author: feedmeapples
issues.summary: The tctl workflow start command fails with an 'Invalid Format' error for execution_timeout, which is no longer required by the server. The command should work without specifying this field.

issues.title: Additional Elastic client config options needed to support AWS Elasticsearch
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: AWS Elasticsearch connections fail due to default sniffing and health check features being incompatible. User requests configuration options to disable these features.

issues.title: creating a dev environment using podman instead of docker-compose
issues.author: Lercher
issues.summary: User requests native Podman support for development environment setup as an alternative to Docker Compose, particularly for systems that only allow user-space containers. They've created and shared a Kubernetes YAML file demonstrating how to run Temporal with Cassandra and Web UI using Podman.

issues.title: tctl wf desc -w <workflowid> shows failure but not failure reason
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: tctl wf desc command shows that a workflow failed but doesn't display the failure reason, requiring users to run separate commands or use temporal-web to understand why the workflow failed.

issues.title: TaskQueue Kind not set for Scheduled WorkflowTask
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: TaskQueue Kind field is not being set when a WorkflowTask is scheduled, showing 'Unspecified' instead of the expected 'Normal' or 'Sticky' value. This affects visibility of task queue metadata in tctl output.

issues.title: Add SignalWithStart\UpdateWithStart command
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add SignalWithStart and UpdateWithStart commands that can be called from within workflow code, currently only available through external gRPC API. This would enable atomic signal-on-start operations directly from workflows instead of requiring workarounds through activities.

issues.title: "Error updating timer ack level for shard" errors when enabling task list partitioning
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Task list partitioning configuration in v0.23.0 causes "Error updating timer ack level for shard" errors in the history service, along with persistence errors in the matching service when adding/updating task lists, though no canary workflow executions actually failed.

issues.title: Retrieved String Search Attribute includes quotation characters
issues.author: pauldemarco
issues.summary: String search attributes are returned with quotation marks included, requiring manual trimming before decoding JSON or other encoded values.

issues.title: Authorizer interface could be richer
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: The Authorizer interface is too simplistic for multi-tenant cluster operators who need to enforce fine-grained authorization policies, including restricting namespace visibility and admin operations. Users want richer context to make authorization decisions beyond just API name and namespace name.

issues.title: Authorizer should be applied to AdminHandler API's
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: The Authorizer interface should be applied to AdminHandler APIs to allow custom authorization logic for multi-tenant clusters. Currently, authorization is only enforced for the workflow Handler, not admin commands, preventing operators from blocking unauthorized admin access.

issues.title: Add support for passing large arguments between activities
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add built-in support for passing large data payloads (30MB+) between activities and workflows. Currently users must implement their own workarounds like saving blobs to external storage and passing URLs instead.

issues.title: CLI unable to show describe workflow output when it has heartbeat data
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: CLI unable to display workflow details when heartbeat data contains non-string values (e.g., numbers). The CLI attempts to unmarshal JSON heartbeat details into a string type, causing deserialization failures.

issues.title: Expose zap logger encoding to config
issues.author: skrul
issues.summary: Temporal server is hardcoded to output logs in JSON format, which is incompatible with infrastructure that requires specific constraints like low cardinality of field names. User requests the ability to use zap's console encoder for regular log line output.

issues.title: No way to set cassandra configs (creds, tls option, etc) via docker-compose
issues.author: markmark206
issues.summary: Docker Compose configuration lacks support for Cassandra credentials and TLS options. Users can only specify Cassandra seeds and keyspaces, but cannot configure authentication parameters, SSL/TLS settings, or replication factors, unlike the MySQL configuration which supports environment variables for credentials.

issues.title: Cassandra Consistency and SerialConsistency should be configurable
issues.author: rfwagner
issues.summary: Cassandra consistency levels (Consistency and SerialConsistency) are hardcoded throughout the codebase and should be made configurable via the Config.Cassandra struct and YAML configuration files.

issues.title: Workflow Status is 'Unspecified' on the default view
issues.author: denispolish
issues.summary: Workflow status displays as 'Unspecified' in the default web UI view instead of showing the actual workflow status. This is a display/UI bug affecting the Temporal Web dashboard.

issues.title: Consider adding CANCELLATION_REQUESTED status to WorkflowExecutionStatus
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: DescribeWorkflowExecutionResponse lacks information about whether a workflow has received a cancellation request. Adding a CANCELLATION_REQUESTED status to WorkflowExecutionStatus enum or a new field would help with troubleshooting.

issues.title: Error: Add search attribute failed
issues.author: pauldemarco
issues.summary: Adding a search attribute via tctl with type Keyword (type 1) fails with a dynamic config update error, but the attribute is still added with the wrong type (String instead of Keyword). The root cause is that the Elasticsearch index template must be manually updated in addition to the dynamic config file.

issues.title: Record activity started and failed event for activity in retry on workflow completion
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity start and failure events are not recorded in workflow history while activities are in retry loops, causing status loss if the workflow completes before the ScheduleToClose timeout is exhausted. The request is to record these events for activities in retry before workflow completion.

issues.title: CLI workflow run command can't process --input param with multiple args
issues.author: feedmeapples
issues.summary: The CLI workflow start command fails to parse the --input parameter when it contains multiple arguments. The processJSONInput function cannot unmarshal the input because it expects valid JSON, but the CLI documentation suggests users should be able to pass multiple space-separated arguments.

issues.title: Matching service unit tests are flaky
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Matching service unit tests are failing intermittently in both local development and CI environments. Once failures start occurring, they persist until the environment is reset.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestContinueAsNewWorkflow_Timeout is flaky
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Integration test TestContinueAsNewWorkflow_Timeout exhibits flaky behavior, taking 5 minutes to pass when it should complete in 5 seconds, indicating timing or synchronization issues in the test or the timeout implementation.

issues.title: TestIntegrationSuite/TestWorkflowTerminationSignalBeforeTransientDecisionStarted is flaky
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Integration test TestWorkflowTerminationSignalBeforeTransientDecisionStarted is flaky, timing out after a minute instead of completing reliably within seconds. The test appears to have race conditions in the workflow termination and signal handling logic.

issues.title: Reset to LastWorkflowTaskCompleted doesn't work for workflows without a single completed workflow task
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The workflow reset API fails when attempting to reset workflows that have timed out without completing any workflow tasks. The reset should fall back to resetting to the start event when no completed workflow task exists.

issues.title: Support Dynamic Cluster IP Addresses in Failure Scenarios
issues.author: shawnhathaway
issues.summary: Support for dynamic cluster IP addresses when all nodes fail simultaneously and restart with new IPs. Currently, nodes attempt to join previous cluster members instead of initializing a new cluster, causing cascading failures.

issues.title: Add reason and details to RequestCancelWorkflowExecutionRequest
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: RequestCancelWorkflowExecutionRequest is missing reason and details fields that exist in TerminateWorkflowExecutionRequest, causing API inconsistency. These fields need to be added to the proto definition and supported in the CLI.

issues.title: Consider separating retention period from uniqueness guarantee period
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Users are forced to choose between database size and uniqueness guarantees because the workflow uniqueness period is directly tied to the retention period. The request is to allow these periods to be configured independently, keeping small uniqueness records after workflow data is deleted.
